text: - I expected when I came in
that it would be like a gleaming factory

with gleaming machinery
everywhere that nobody touches.

But in fact, the engineers
are keenly involved
with all the services, top to bottom.

- We get to decide our
culture, our processes.
- The best part I like about AWS,
there's no other places like AWS.
- And we all feel like kids,
jumping into these difficult problems,
tackling it from different angles.
- [Nerisha] In terms of coding,

we do a lot of Java
development, JavaScript, Ruby.

- Still feel like I work
for a small startup,
but we have a big company name behind us.

- We're building a really cool
product for our customers,
and to do so, you have to solve some
really interesting technical problems.
- The culture is amazing within AWS.
The pace at which we go, and the scale,

you never get to work
with this type of scale.
(upbeat music)
